info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 21 at 10:01AM CDT until May 22 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen SD
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Grand River Near Little Eagle affecting Corson County.
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...
Oak Creek near Wakpala affecting Corson County.
.For sites with a river forecast, the forecast includes precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any future precipitation could affect the forecasts.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Grand River near Little Eagle.
* WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Low-lying pasture and hay land along the river begins to flood
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM MDT Wednesday the stage was 15.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 AM MDT Wednesday was 15.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 4.7 feet Monday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr.
The next statement will be issued by late tonight at 1245 AM MDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT
